--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, samurai@x wrote:
> 
> Is there going to be an article published illustrating the 
rationale?
> The conclusion is very interesting, but I'd love to hear how it came 
to
> be arrived at. 
> 
> - darcy

Darcy -

No article planned, but you can get the rationale by
entering "saotome" in the search engine at:

http://www.csse.monash.edu.au/cgi-bin/cgiwrap/jwb/wwwjdic?1KJ


Also a picture of a really rare Saotome plate with a
self portrait of the maker (possibly the only such
plate known). The zogan is probably a later Nara 
addition. Which also proves the Saotome women sold
their stuff to other folks :-)

http://home.earthlink.net/~ttstein/joke.jpg

Rich S
